typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_key as string,
		agresso_emp_id as string,
		emp_first_name as string,
		emp_last_name as string,
		emp_job_phone as string,
		emp_job_email as string,
		main_gard_office_location as string,
		emp_name as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		incident_team_code as string,
		incident_team_desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_employee.parquet']) ~> preDimEmployee
preDimEmployee derive(top_key = 'All',
		top_description = 'All Employees') ~> DeriveTopLevel
DeriveTopLevel alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(PK_KEY))) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_employee.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimEmployee
